=== Bator updates ===

Authors: Ulf Andrae, Eoin Whelan, Trygve Aspelinen, Siebren de Haan, Angeles Hernandez (Per Unden removed as his change has been superseded in CY45)

Description:BATOR decoding updates and corrections

    Add synop_8 (307005), amdarv01 (311001), amdarv10 (311010), temptac (309007), tempstac (309196), pilottac (301001) and buoytac (308003) subroutines to read older WMO/ECMWF conventional BUFR templates[[BR]]
    Add various ECMWF defined BUFR subtype, codetype and reportype definitions as per [http://apps.ecmwf.int/odbgov http://apps.ecmwf.int/odbgov] [[BR]]
    Add option to prevent reading of (non-existent) SECOND information from AMDAR, TEMP and PILOT BUFR[[BR]]
    Adding Mode-S EHS to the observation data set with correct observation error for temperature (depends on '''Package D''')[[BR]]
    Fix to decode MARS bufr AMVs with Bator[[BR]]
    Update Bator logging of observation counts

svn changesets:14676,14846,14956,15550,15602,15674,15693,15694,15776,15795,15820,15829,15856

             Reduces the amount of ice nucleus avoiding too dry atmosphere for temperatures below freezing [[BR]]

=== Shallow convection ===

Authors:Lisa Bengtsson

Description:
            Modifications to shallow convection scheme in orde to improve precipitation falling from shallow convective clouds. LTROPEC=TRUE (default=FALSE) precipitation tendencies in SC scheme are added to the source terms of precipitation entering in the cloud microphysics, such that ther are advected before next time step

=== Two patches and OI assimilation ===
Authors:Patrick Samuelsson, Yurii Batrack  

Description: 
             Modifications to combine 2 patches and OI assimilation.[[BR]]
             The SURFEX assimilation code is prepared to utilize open land (PATCH=1) as first guess when Canari is modified for this in the future. However,for now, the grid-averaged values of T2M and rh2m are used[[BR]]
             Added min/max of T2m per patch to SURFEX output[[BR]]
             sfxflddesc_mod.F90 has been rearranged and complemented with new variables. Useful changes to list missing variables in sfsflddesc_mod.F90 and exit.[[BR]]
             Fixes to run all testbed cases with SICE configuration using non-ifs host models.[[BR]]
             Correct surfex lfi/fa translations for SSO_CAN_XNN variables[[BR]]
             Added funcionality in mode_read_grib.F90 to read lsm usingalso SHORTNAME='lsm' if needed
